Ape
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): CD/DVD/Game List: Ape
NOTE
MR4 technically lists each ape as a separate breed. We are listing them here for simplicity's sake only.
  • Pirate Ape (Ape/?) December 5 - 04:11 pm

  • RedShortsApe (Ape/?) January 14 - 05:34 pm

  • Pipo Ape (Ape/?) November 14 - 09:22 pm
